H0.text: What is the world's biggest car maker. Volkswagen

H1.text: What is the world's biggest car maker. General Motors

H2.text: What is the world's biggest car maker. Ford

H3.text: What is the world's biggest car maker. トヨタ

A4.text: Toyota is the largest automobile manufacturer in the world, producing about 10 million vehicles per year.

A5.text: By 2020, Toyota reclaimed its position as the largest automaker in the world, surpassing Volkswagen.
